name: 紀乃文
objective:
本課程選定「建築資訊模型」（BIM）為核心，以 Autodesk Revit 作為工程應用軟體，訓練學生程式設計的基礎能力與物件導向程式設計的思維概念，以進一步將其應用並實踐在建築資訊模型的 API 應用程式開發之上，包含自 BIM 模型當中擷取屬性資訊、進階數量計算、寫入自訂參數、自動化修改模型及與其他應用程式軟體的交互操作等技術。

 This course aims to train the enrolled students to develop basic computer programming skills as well as the Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) concepts, and then implement them on the development of Application Programming Interface (API) applications for BIM software. These advanced application includes extracting information from BIM models, adding custom parameters to BIM models, performing advanced quantity takeoffs, automatically modifying the BIM models, or interacting with other software packages.
schedule:
1　　Course introduction
2　　Introduction to BIM and Revit API: Basic settings for IDE and Revit API
3　　Introduction to C# programming language: Standard IO and windows form
4　　Introduction to C# programming language: Variables
5　　Introduction to C# programming language: Control flow 
6　　Introduction to C# programming language:Array and containers 
7　　Introduction to C# programming language: Loop 
8　　Introduction to C# programming language: Function
9　　Term project proposal presentation
10　　Introduction to C# programming language: Object Oriented Programming(1)
11　　Introduction to C# programming language: Object Oriented Programming(2)
12　　Revit API implementation: Access the parameters in BIM model
13　　Revit API implementation: Data exchange between BIM model and database
14　　Revit API implementation: Create/Modify components for BIM model(1)
15　　Revit API implementation: Create/Modify components for BIM model(2)
16　　Final presentation
scorePolicy:
作業 Assignments (40%)
課堂練習 Lab Exercise (30%) 
期末專題（需以英文上台發表） Term Project (30%)
